titleStmt.title: A full and perfect account of the particulars of the terrible and bloody fight, which the Christian armies have obtained over the whole Turkish forces near the bridge of Esseck. With a particular of what plunder they have seiz'd and taken / Written from a person of quality who was present in the whole action.
titleStmt.author: Person of quality.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
